security_audit.summary: This skill is a content validation tool with no malicious patterns. The static analyzer misidentified template literals and regex patterns as shell execution commands. All file I/O is restricted to the project's outputs directory with deterministic paths. API credentials are loaded securely from environment variables. No data exfiltration or unauthorized network access detected.

content.value_statement: This skill analyzes any content against proven viral factors like curiosity gaps, emotional triggers, and shareability patterns. It scores your posts and provides an optimized rewrite to maximize engagement.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes content against 6 viral factors including curiosity gaps and emotional resonance
Generates a scoring report with strengths and improvement areas
Provides a completely rewritten version optimized for maximum viral potential
Supports batch processing of multiple content files
limitations: Requires valid Anthropic API key for content analysis
Currently optimized for English and Chinese content styles
Output quality depends on the quality of input content

best_practices: Provide complete content including title and body for accurate scoring
Use the rewritten version as a starting point and add your authentic voice
Run verification multiple times after each revision to track improvement
anti_patterns: Do not expect viral success without adding original insights to the rewritten version
Avoid submitting very short content (under 50 words) as results will be limited
Do not rely solely on the skill without understanding viral principles yourself

faq.question: What does viral potential score mean?
faq.answer: The score (0-100) estimates how likely your content is to spread based on proven viral factors like emotional triggers and curiosity gaps.

faq.question: Does the skill rewrite my content?
faq.answer: Yes, it provides a complete rewritten version optimized for viral potential. You can use it directly or as inspiration.

faq.question: Can I use this for non-English content?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill works with Chinese and English content. Other languages may work but quality varies.

faq.question: How many files can I process at once?
faq.answer: The script processes up to 10 pending files by default. You can specify individual files as arguments.

faq.question: Do I need an API key?
faq.answer: Yes, you need ANTHROPIC_API_KEY in your .env file to use the automated script.
